```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(janitor)
library(readxl)
library(stringr)
```

interest variables: patientid, visitid,losdays2, admitedtm, is30dayreadmit, mews, evisit, icu_flag,ageyear, gender, insurancetype. 
```{r}
gh_data=read_excel("GHProject_Dataset.xlsx") %>% 
  clean_names() %>% 
  filter(!is.na(mews)) %>% 
  select(patientid, visitid,losdays2, admitdtm, race, is30dayreadmit, mews, evisit, icu_flag,ageyear, gender, insurancetype) %>% 
  filter(icu_flag==0) %>% 
  select(-admitdtm,-icu_flag)

gh_clean=gh_data[!duplicated(gh_data$patientid),]
```

```{r}
fit1=lm(losdays2~is30dayreadmit+mews+evisit+ageyear+gender+insurancetype+race,data=gh_clean)
summary(fit1)
```
